item.description: {{ with .Site.Data.particlejs.particle.params.animation.particle.pagedescription }}{{ . | markdownify }}{{ end}} hljs.initHighlightingOnLoad(); .flash { position: relative; padding: 16px; color: #032f62; background-color: #dbedff; border: 1px solid rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.15); border-radius: 3px; } .flash p:last-child { margin-bottom: 0; } .flash-messages { margin-bottom: 24px; } .flash-close { float: right; padding: 16px; margin: -16px; color: inherit; text-align: center; cursor: pointer; background: none; border: 0; -webkit-appearance: none; -moz-appearance: none; appearance: none; opacity: 0.
